localizedText.AUTHENTICATOR_DESCRIPTION: Enter the 6-digit security code from your authentication app
localizedText.HTTP_LISTENER_NOT_FOUND: HTTP listener with domain {0} not found
localizedText.LOAD_CONFIG_ERROR: Unable to load config for extension {0}
localizedText.SYSTRAY_CREATE_ERROR: Unable to create system tray entry
localizedText.UPDATE_ERROR: Update to version {0} failed with error: {1}
localizedText.IPV4_FALLBACK: Listening on IPv6 endpoint {0} failed, retrying with IPv4.
localizedText.ERROR_INTERVAL_ZERO: Loop request with interval set to zero
localizedText.NAME: Name
localizedText.DESC_FILESHTTPHEADERS: Add or remove HTTP headers to that file. 'unset {name}' can be used to remove a default header.
localizedText.DESC_FLOODPROTECTION: Allowed WebSocket requests per client IP per second.
localizedText.DESC_HTTP_FLOODPROTECTION: Allowed HTTP requests per client IP per second per URI.
localizedText.DESC_SUBSCRIPTION_FLOODPROTECTION: Allowed subscribe/unsubscribe requests per client IP per second
localizedText.DESC_FLOODPROTECTION_LOG_INTERVAL: Time to wait before creating the next 'request failed' log entry.
localizedText.DESC_CLIENTPRIORITYLIST: IP addresses of preferred clients. If the client limit is reached these clients will be able to connect and clients which are not in this list will be disconnected.
localizedText.DESC_CHUNKSIZE: Downloaded files will be split into chunks of this size.
localizedText.DESC_CHECKSUMENABLED: Checksum of uploaded files will be validated during publishing.
localizedText.DESC_ACCESS: Limits the access that can be inherited from the default symbol access of a user group. This limit is not enforced for user groups that set the access level for this symbol explicitly.
localizedText.DESC_SYMBOLACCESS: Used if no other access level is specified for a mapped symbol. Is limited by the access level that is specified on the mapped symbol.
localizedText.DESC_USERGROUPS_SYMBOLS: Override the default symbol access level for specific mapped symbols.
localizedText.DESC_REVIEWER_GROUPS: Before the symbol can be written a user of one of these usergroup must confirm by an own Login command
localizedText.TOOLTIP_REVIEWER_GROUPS: Reviewers can only be requested if the re-authentication is required
localizedText.DESC_EXTENSION_DATA_DOMAINS: Server commands can contain additional information for server extensions. The domains of these extensions can be specified here.
localizedText.TOOLTIP_EXTENSION_DATA_DOMAINS: The additional information is transferred within the command object in an additional 'extensionData' object
localizedText.DESC_FLOODPROTECTION_LEVEL: The allowed number of requests per symbol can be configured via the level setting.
localizedText.TOOLTIP_FLOODPROTECTION_LEVEL: Disabled = No limits</br>Restrictive = 10 requests per second</br>Medium = 50 requests per second
localizedText.DESC_EXTENSION: Server extensions are used to integrate additional functionality into the server.
localizedText.DESC_REQUIRE_CLIENT_CERTIFICATE: A client certificate is required to establish an HTTPS connection
localizedText.DESC_RANGE_REQUEST_SIZE: HTTP range requests (streamed videos) will be split in chunks of this size.
localizedText.DESC_GZIP_MIN_SIZE: Prevents small data from getting zipped.
localizedText.DESC_GLOBAL_HTTP_HEADERS: These headers will be added to all HTTP responses.
localizedText.EXTENSION_ERROR: Error while using server extension '{0}' in extension container: {1}
localizedText.EXTENSION_ERROR_LOG_FILE: The extension container log file for server extension '{0}' could not be deleted: {1}
localizedText.EXTENSION_NOT_LICENSED: Extension not licensed: Activate license with TwinCAT
localizedText.EXTENSION_SDK_LICENSE_MISSING: Extension '{0}' not licensed: Activate extension SDK license with TwinCAT
localizedText.EXTENSION_NOT_RUNNING_ERROR_CFG_PAGE: Running extension in extension container failed because the connection has been interrupted.
localizedText.EXTENSION_DEBUGGER_ATTACHED_CFG_PAGE: A debugger is or will be attached to the extension
localizedText.EXTENSION_UPGRADE: Upgrading configuration '{0}' of {1} from v{2} to v{3}

localizedText.ACTIVE_LOCKOUT_PROTECTION: Client certificate disabled: local endpoint missing
localizedText.AUTH_FAILED_INVALID_PARAMETER: Login failed because of an invalid parameter. The session ID was {0}
localizedText.AUTH_FAILED_INVALID_SESSION: Login failed because session {0} is invalid
localizedText.DESC_SHOW_MAINTENANCE_MODE: The login page can be used to enter the maintenance mode. If this setting is false /LoginMaintenance can be used instead. Requires a user in the __SystemMaintenanceUsers group.
localizedText.UPLOAD_FAILED: Upload for file {0} failed with error {1}
localizedText.DESC_EXTENSION_PATH: Local path of the extension DLL
localizedText.DISCOVERY_DESC: Changes will become active after a server restart
localizedText.CONFIG_VERSION_CONFLICT: Cannot update config: Config has changed in another environment
localizedText.LOGIN_ERROR: Login failed: Invalid username or password
localizedText.LOGIN_NOT_IN_MAINTENANCE_GROUP: The user is not in the __SystemMaintenanceUsers group
localizedText.LOGIN_ERROR_WAIT: Too many failed login attempts: Please try again later
localizedText.EXTENSION_SHUTDOWN_FAIL: Failed to shut down extension '{0}' possibly triggered by blocking threads: Contact the extension developer
localizedText.LICENSE_ERROR: Server license validation failed with error {0} (underlying ADS error: {1})
localizedText.ASYNC_CONFIG_ERROR: Asynchronous config handler returned an error for symbol '{0}' with request ID {1} in domain '{2}': {3}
localizedText.DEFAULTCONFIGURABLE: Can be set for specific remote configuration.
localizedText.PASSWORDS_SAME: New password must be different from the current password
localizedText.INITIALIZE_TIMEOUT_MESSAGE: Timeout - restart required to initialize the server. The server must be initialized in the first 5 minutes after it is started.
localizedText.DEFAULT_AUTH_EXTENSION_NOT_FOUND: Default authentication extension not found - using {0} by default
localizedText.RESTART_TEXT: Server is restarting... Click on the following link to go back to config after restart:
localizedText.UNSAVED_CHANGES_CONFIG: Unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave?
localizedText.CONFIRM_REMOVE: Do you really want to delete this value?
localizedText.DESC_REMOTESERVERS: Connections to other HMI servers. The mapped symbols of remote servers can be used like symbols from extensions of the current server.
localizedText.REMOTE_SERVER_URL_RESOLVE_FAILED: Could not resolve address of remote server: {0} ({1})
localizedText.REMOTE_SERVER_CONNECT_FAILED: Could not connect to remote server: {0}
localizedText.REMOTE_SERVER_SESSION_START_FAILED: Could not start session for remote server: {0}
localizedText.REMOTE_SERVER_CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED: Connection to remote server was established ({0})
localizedText.DESC_REMOTE_USERNAME: This username is ignored if client certificates are used or authentication is disabled on the remote server.
localizedText.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED: Browser not supported. Please open the website with a modern browser using one of the following IP addresses:
localizedText.ERROR_SERVER_EXTENSION_PROCESS_NOT_ENABL: Running server extensions in an own process is disabled.
localizedText.ERROR_SERVER_EXTENSION_PROCESS_LEGACY_NO: Running server extensions that use the TcHmiSrvExtNet API in an own process is disabled.
localizedText.ERROR_DOTNET_CLASSIC_NOT_SUPPORTED: Running server extensions that target the classic .NET framework into the server process is not supported on this platform.
localizedText.ERROR_EXTENSION_CONTAINER_REQUEST_FAILED: Extension container request '{0}' in domain '{1}' failed with error '{2}'
Extension container request '{0}' in domain '{1}' failed with error '{2}': {3}

Sending a response to extension container request '{0}' in domain '{1}' failed with error '{2}': {3}
localizedText.ERROR_EXTENSION_CONTAINER_MISSING_FRAMEW: Failed to load extension '{0}' because .NET {1} {2} or later could not be found.
localizedText.WARNING_EXTENSION_CONTAINER_MISSING_FRAM: Cannot find .NET {0} {1} or later required by the extension container. The application may not work properly.
localizedText.LICENSE_CHECK_FAILED: The HMI server was unable to fetch the license information from TwinCAT's license server. This problem only has an effect if it still exists after {0} seconds.
localizedText.LICENSE_NEW_PENDING_STATE: The state of one or more licenses used by the HMI server switched to state 'Pending'. This change will only be adopted if it still exists after {0} seconds.
localizedText.DESC_TIMEZONE: Leave empty to use client timezone.
localizedText.DESC_LOCALE: Leave empty to use client locale.
localizedText.CONFIGURATION_ERROR_SCHEMA: Invalid schema for symbol '{0}' at position '{1}'
localizedText.CLIENT_LOG_ERROR_NO_INDEXEDDB_DATABASE: Can't find log database: Please activate "Log persistent" and reload the TwinCAT HMI project to create a persistent log database
localizedText.CLIENT_LOG_WAITING_FOR_IDB_CLIENTS_TO_CL: Waiting for further clients in this browser instance to close its database connections before deleting database: Please close running clients
localizedText.SCHEMA_ACCESS_ERROR: No access to the configuration schema.
localizedText.TEMPORARY_EVENTS_RESET: The temporary events of the '{domain}' domain were reset.
localizedText.EXTENSION_NOT_INITIALIZED: Initialization of the extension has not yet been completed
localizedText.MULTIPLE_REQUESTS_FAILED_MSG: {0} server requests have failed in the last {1} seconds: {2}
localizedText.MULTIPLE_SYMBOL_REQUESTS_FAILED_MSG: {0} symbol requests for symbol '{1}' have failed in the last {2} seconds: {3}
localizedText.MULTIPLE_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUESTS_FAILED_MS: {0} subscription requests have failed in the last {1} seconds: {2}
localizedText.DESC_DISABLED_CONFIG_HINTS: Hints which should not be shown anymore.
localizedText.NO_VALID_AUTH_EXTENSION_HINT: The default authentication extension is not valid.
localizedText.REQUIREAUTH_REMOTE_HINT: Authentication is not required for remote access. This might put your system at risk.
localizedText.HTTPS_REMOTE_HINT: The HTTP endpoint "{0}" is configured for remote access. This might put your system at risk.
localizedText.ENDPOINTS_OVERWRITTEN_HINT: The server has been started with endpoint startup parameters and changes to endpoints will be overwritten after the next server restart.
localizedText.ENDPOINTS_OVERWRITTEN_MSG: The server endpoints have been overwritten with startup parameters.
localizedText.USERGROUP_IS_ADMIN: The user group '{0}' grants admin rights, because symbol access was set to 'Read-Write'.
localizedText.DIAGNOSTICS_LOGGED_HINT: Diagnostics messages are logged for some domains. This has a negative impact on performance.
localizedText.WEBSERVER_DIAGNOSTICS_LOGGED_HINT: The server was started with web server diagnostics enabled. Additional messages about sockets will be logged.
localizedText.CONFIG_OVERWRITE_USED: A config overwrite file is active.
localizedText.CONFIGURATION_UPDATED_HINT: Configuration has been updated. Reload to get the latest changes.
localizedText.CRASH_REPORT_EXISTING_HINT: A previous session of the TcHmiSrv process exited unexpectedly. The following error reports have been created: {0}
localizedText.INVALID_USER_CONFIG: Invalid user config. The current user has lost the right to access '{0}'. Press Logout to clean up your current user session.
localizedText.DESC_SAMESITE_ATTRIBUTE: Specifies whether cookies should be sent for cross-page requests.
localizedText.TOOLTIP_SAMESITE_ATTRIBUTE: Option 'None' is only available via HTTPS
localizedText.LOGIN_PAGE_NO_COOKIES_ERROR: No cookies: Try to reload or clear all cookies in browser settings
localizedText.SYMBOL_UP_TO_DATE: Schema of the mapping and the linked symbol are equal.
localizedText.SYMBOL_SCHEMA_DIFFERENCE: Schema differs between mapping and linked symbol.
localizedText.SYMBOL_INVALID_SYMBOL: The linked symbol does not exist.
localizedText.DESC_BASE_HMI_URL: This URL is linked on the configuration page
localizedText.DESC_SYMBOL_COMPLEXITY_LIMIT: Defines how complex a schema may be when mapping a symbol. The number of sub-symbols is counted
localizedText.DESC_CLIENT_CACHE_MAX_AGE: Defines how long server responses may be cached.
localizedText.TOOLTIP_SET_DEFAULT_VALUE: Click to use the default value.
localizedText.TOOLTIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_USED: Default value is used. Click to change it.
localizedText.DESC_MAXREQUESTSIZE: Requests that are larger than this limit will be rejected by the web server.
localizedText.DESC_REQUIREAUTH: Authentication should only be disabled on private networks.
localizedText.DESC_AUTO_LOGOFF: Can be overridden for individual user accounts. This value is used when no other value is specified for the current user.
localizedText.DESC_AUTO_LOGINUSER: The user account that is configured here is logged in automatically when a new session is opened.
localizedText.DESC_ALLOW_REMOTE_ADMIN: The __SystemAdministrator is allowed to log in from a remote endpoint. If disabled, the __SystemAdministrator can only log in from the local machine.
localizedText.DESC_CUSTOM_CSS: Custom CSS for login and error pages
localizedText.DESC_ENDPOINTS: IPv4 and IPv6 endpoints are supported. Only HTTPS endpoints should be enabled for remote access. Use the wildcard addresses '0.0.0.0' and '[::]' to accept remote connections on all network interfaces.
localizedText.DESC_ETAGENABLED: The entity tag HTTP header is an identifier for a specific version of a resource.
localizedText.DESC_SESSIONSTORAGE: Sessions are saved here so that they are still valid after a server restart.
localizedText.DESC_SYMBOLS: Mapped symbols are used to grant access to internal symbols of a domain.
localizedText.DESC_TEMPDH: Custom parameters for the Diffie-Hellman (DH) key-exchange.
localizedText.DESC_GZIPENABLED: GZIP compression is used by the server and web clients to improve transfer speed and bandwidth utilization.
localizedText.DESC_MAXHTTPHEADERSIZE: Requests with HTTP headers that are larger than this limit will be rejected by the web server.
localizedText.DESC_CACHEENABLED: If enabled, the web-server stores frequently requested data such as web pages, images, and similar media content in RAM to improve response times.
localizedText.DESC_DEFAULTDOCUMENT: This default page is served when a web client requests a URL that points to a directory structure instead of an actual web page within the directory structure.
localizedText.DESC_RECORDING_MESSAGE_MAX_LENGTH: Maximum length of a recorded message
localizedText.DESC_CERTIFICATEEXPIRATION: Shorter validity durations limit the damage from key compromise and mis-issuance. Stolen keys and mis-issued certificates are valid for a shorter period of time.
localizedText.DESC_COOKIEEXPIRATIONDATE: The server uses cookies to store session IDs. Make sure that the cookie expiration date and the automatic logout duration are not in conflict.
localizedText.DESC_DEFAULTAUTHEXTENSION: Multiple authentication extensions can be used at the same time. The default authentication extension is automatically selected on the login page.
localizedText.DESC_DIAGNOSTICS_DOMAINS: Logging diagnostics data are useful to diagnose problems but they have a negative impact on performance.
localizedText.DESC_INITTIMEOUT: It should not take longer than this to initialize a server extension.
localizedText.DESC_SHUTDOWNTIMEOUT: It should not take longer than this to unload a server extension.
localizedText.DESC_USERSELECTTYPE: If there are only a few user accounts, selecting the user account using a list box can simplify the login process.
localizedText.DESC_MAXCONNECTIONSPERCLIENT: Keep in mind that web browsers might open multiple simultaneous connections to the same server to achieve faster load times.
localizedText.DESC_DEFLATECOMPRESSIONLEVEL: GZIP compression is used by the server and web clients to improve transfer speed and bandwidth utilization.
localizedText.DESC_DEFAULTUSERGROUP: All user accounts are automatically added to this user group.
localizedText.DESC_CLIENTCERTIFICATES: Client certificates in this list can access the server. You can also link certificates to user groups and use them as an alternative login mechanism.
localizedText.DESC_DEFAULTEVENTEXTENSION: When the 'ListEvents' function symbol is called, the events are requested from the default event extension.
localizedText.DESC_UPLOADTIMEOUT: Upload requests will be rejected if they do not succeed after this duration.
localizedText.DESC_VIRTUALDIRECTORIES: Virtual directories are used to specify which folders paths on the file system should be served by the web server.
localizedText.DESC_PERMESSAGEDEFLATEENABLED: Try to enable compression for all WebSocket requests. Compression is not enabled for clients that don't support it.
localizedText.DESC_CONFIGURATIONS: The names of all existing configurations.
localizedText.DESC_USERGROUPS: User groups have access permissions to specific symbols and files. Permissions are assigned to users based on user groups they are a member of.
localizedText.DESC_USERGROUPUSERS: The account settings and group memberships of all users from all authentication extensions.
localizedText.DESC_SHOW_CONFIGURATION_HINTS: Configuration hints inform about problematic settings or combinations of settings in the configurations of the server or server extensions.
localizedText.DESC_SELFSIGNEDROOTCA: This certificate is used to create self-signed server certificates.
localizedText.DESC_KEY: This key is used to decrypt the certificate.
localizedText.DESC_SELFSIGNEDROOTCAKEY: This key is used to decrypt the root certificate.
localizedText.DESC_KEYPASSWORD: Password used to decrypt the private key or pfx file. If the certificate does not require a password, this field can be empty.
localizedText.DESC_PROJECTNAME: The name of the HMI project.
localizedText.DESC_PROJECTVERSION: This is the version of the HMI project that has been published to this server.
localizedText.DESC_FILES: Special handling and permissions for specific files or directories.
localizedText.DESC_FILESREGEX: Special handling and permissions for specific files or directories that match the given regular expression.
localizedText.DESC_USEINT64STRING: Transmit int64 as string and not as base64
localizedText.DESC_EXTENSION_HOST_MAX_RELOADS: Maximum number of attempts to load the extension
localizedText.DESC_EXTENSION_HOST_RELOAD_INTERVAL: Interval between attempts to load the extension
localizedText.descExportEventFilter: Condition according to which the events should be filtered (example: 'domain == "ADS"').
localizedText.descExportFilter: Path in configuration which should be exported (example: 'path::to::export')
localizedText.LOGIN_DESC_ENABLE_2FA: Your administrator has enabled two-factor authentication for your account.
localizedText.USERMANAGEMENT_DESC_ENABLE_2FA: Please scan the QR code with an appropriate app and enter the code to complete the setup.

localizedText.PLAYGROUND_WEBSOCKET_FAILED_MSG: WebSocket client initialization failed. Please refresh the page.
localizedText.RENAME_USERGROUP_SYMBOL_FAILED: Failed to update access rights for symbol rename: unable to transfer user group permissions from '{0}' to '{1}'.
localizedText.DELETE_USERGROUP_SYMBOL_FAILED: Error updating access rights when deleting symbol: '{0}'
